about_the_game:
Inspired by Monster Girl's Labyrinth, Dungeon Vixens is a dungeon crawling rouge-like monster girl adventure with retro graphics. You play as a lone protagonist with a quest to reclaim his love.




The dungeon he is about to enter however is filled with a lot of temptations and challenges. Such as the Succubus Lilura and many other sexy vixens that roam the halls. Using your attack and defense slider system timing is everything.

Will you mend your heart or be lost forever in a Vixen filled dungeon of lust and pleasure?


- Mysterious and intricate labyrinth setting, filled with hidden secrets and challenges.
- 18 Challenging Levels with over 90 minutes of gameplay and even more to obtain all treasures of the dungeon.
- Over 20 monster girls each with their own styles and sex scenes!
- Many challenges and secrets buried within the tunnels to discover!
- Minigames within the walls of the dungeon: Slot Machines & other interactive elements.
- Multiple Endings depending on the players choices including a SECRET ending.
- 5 Trading Cards & 6 Achievments!



All characters of Dungeon Vixens: A Tale of Temptation are 18+ and over

content_descriptors.notes:
Dungeon Vixens contains the following content:
-Risque outfits, sexual comments and adult situations
-Sex Scenes (Blowjobs, consensual sex, public nudity and sex with fantasy characters. Non consensual sex.
-Sex with magical and mythical creatures (Orcs, Demons)
-All characters in Dungeon Vixens are 18+ and over

detailed_description:
Inspired by Monster Girl's Labyrinth, Dungeon Vixens is a dungeon crawling rouge-like monster girl adventure with retro graphics. You play as a lone protagonist with a quest to reclaim his love.




The dungeon he is about to enter however is filled with a lot of temptations and challenges. Such as the Succubus Lilura and many other sexy vixens that roam the halls. Using your attack and defense slider system timing is everything.

Will you mend your heart or be lost forever in a Vixen filled dungeon of lust and pleasure?


- Mysterious and intricate labyrinth setting, filled with hidden secrets and challenges.
- 18 Challenging Levels with over 90 minutes of gameplay and even more to obtain all treasures of the dungeon.
- Over 20 monster girls each with their own styles and sex scenes!
- Many challenges and secrets buried within the tunnels to discover!
- Minigames within the walls of the dungeon: Slot Machines & other interactive elements.
- Multiple Endings depending on the players choices including a SECRET ending.
- 5 Trading Cards & 6 Achievments!



All characters of Dungeon Vixens: A Tale of Temptation are 18+ and over

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.4
  • Processor: Any Dual-Core Processor (Intel or AMD)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce MX150 / Vega 8 or better with 2GB of Graphics Memory
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: The game is optimized for a wide range of hardware, but a dedicated GPU is recommended for the best experience.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.4
  • Processor: Any Dual-Core Processor (Intel or AMD)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce MX150 / Vega 8 or better with 2GB of Graphics Memory
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: The game is optimized for a wide range of hardware, but a dedicated GPU is recommended for the best experience.
